docs.lead_paragraph: Susan Long, known as Baby Girl Foster when she was born, is an adoptee who recently went on a search for her lost past. The above is the rejection she received when she tried to obtain her original birth certificate with the hope that it would have her mother's full name.
docs.abstract: Betty Jean Lifton article on involvement of adult adoptees in what has come to be known as The Search, effort to learn about their past; drawings (L)
